---
title: Options for downloading data
engine: julia
---


Download OSHB annotations for the entire Hebrew Bible:
```{julia}
#| warning: false
#| output: false
using OpenScripturesHebrew
words = tanakh()
```

```{julia}
length(words)
```

Alternatively, download a named section of the Bible using one of the functions `torah`, `writings`, or `prophets`.



```{julia}
#| warning: false
#| output: false
torahwords = torah()
```

```{julia}
length(torahwords)
```

You can also download a single book of the Bible.
```{julia}
#| warning: false
#| output: false
genesiswords = compilebook_remote("Gen")
```

```{julia}
length(genesiswords)
```
```{julia}
using Markdown
abbrlist = keys(OpenScripturesHebrew.bookids) |> collect |> sort
items = map(abbrlist) do a
    raw = OpenScripturesHebrew.bookids[a]
    cooked = replace(raw, r"^([0-5])" => s"\1 ") |> titlecase
    string("- ", cooked, ": ", a)
end
join(items, "\n") |> Markdown.parse
```
